nodes.text: Ark Roose's Podracer was a Podracer owned by Ark Roose prior to the Invasion of Naboo. He piloted the Pod during the Boonta Eve Classic won by Anakin Skywalker.

The Pod was powered by two Plug-8G 927 Cluster Array engines, consisting of sixteen engines in two clusters. The Podracer accelerated quickly, it was very fast and delivered easy engine cooling methods such as an open-air channel in the middle of the vehicle. What the Plug-G had in speed, it lacked in handling and turning, so it often held the advantage on straight courses.
